info.title: ITMastermindz API
info.description: API documentation for ITMastermindz, a platform for IT-related online courses

post.description: Create a new user on registration

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Sample schema to add new user

201.description: User successfully created, returns the user's jsonwebtoken and role.

get.description: Get a list of all users information

200.description: Success, returns a list of user objects.

about_me.example: Hi! My name is John Doe

put.description: Update a user\'s account data. User id is obtained from jwt

201.description: Update successful, returns the updated user data

about_me.example: Hi! My name is John Doe

post.description: Add a sublecture as viewed by the user. User id is obtained from jwt token

201.description: Success, sublecture is marked as viewed.

post.description: Verify that a user\'s login credentials are correct and generate a jwt

200.description: User successfully logged in, returns the user's jsonwebtoken and role.

get.description: Retrieve a user\'s information, but contains more sensetive data (such as email). User id obtained from jwt

200.description: Success, returns a array of user objects.

about_me.example: Hi! My name is John Doe

get.description: Decode the jwt. Returns the decoded payload if successful

200.description: Success, token is valid. Returns the payload

get.description: Get the base64 encoded image of the profile picture of the user based on the jwt

200.description: Success, returns the id of the profile picture, the user's id and the base64 encoded picture

put.description: Update a user\'s profile picture. User id is obtained from jwt

parameters.name: pic
parameters.description: The file object of the profile picture to update

get.description: Get the base64 encoded image of the profile picture of the user as specified in the id parameter

200.description: Success, returns the id of the profile picture, the user's id and the base64 encoded picture

get.description: Retrieve a user\'s profile information (regular info, profile pic, overall quiz data, completed courses). User id obtained from parameter

200.description: Success, returns user data

get.description: Get all viewed sublectures by a user under a course. User is obtained from jwt

200.description: Success, returns a array of sublecture ids

get.description: Retrieve a list of users that match the query by name or job title

200.description: Success, returns an array of users that match the query

get.description: Get the information of the user as specified in the id parameter

200.description: Success, returns a user object

about_me.example: Hi! My name is John Doe

put.description: Update a user\'s password. User id is obtained from jwt

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Sample schema to update user password

201.description: Update successful, returns the new password

post.description: Create a new course. Limited to lecturers only.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Sample body schema to create a new course

description.example: Learn how to use xcode with the swift programming language to develop IOS mobile apps

details.example: In this course, you will learn the basics of the swift programming language, make and design elements with xcode and launch an app

caption.example: Lead by industry professionals to master IOS app development

parameters.name: thumbnail
parameters.description: The file object of the thumbnail of the course

parameters.name: video
parameters.description: The file object of the video of the course

201.description: Success, return the newly created course.

description.example: Learn how to use xcode with the swift programming language to develop IOS mobile apps

details.example: In this course, you will learn the basics of the swift programming language, make and design elements with xcode and launch an app

caption.example: Lead by industry professionals to master IOS app development

get.description: Get a list of all courses

200.description: Success, returns a array of course objects.

description.example: A JavaScript-based open-source front-end web framework for developing single-page applications.

details.example: Learn the fundamentals of Angular JS

caption.example: AWS Coaching and Certification helps you build and validate your skills so you can get more out of the cloud.

get.description: Get a list of all courses without their introductory video

200.description: Success, returns a array of course objects without their video.

description.example: A JavaScript-based open-source front-end web framework for developing single-page applications.

details.example: Learn the fundamentals of Angular JS

caption.example: AWS Coaching and Certification helps you build and validate your skills so you can get more out of the cloud.

get.description: Get a course by its id

200.description: Success, returns the course objects.

description.example: A JavaScript-based open-source front-end web framework for developing single-page applications.

details.example: Learn the fundamentals of Angular JS

caption.example: AWS Coaching and Certification helps you build and validate your skills so you can get more out of the cloud.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Sample body schema to update a pre-existing course course

description.example: A JavaScript front-end web framework for single-page application development

caption.example: Lead by industry professionals and gives an industry certification

200.description: Success, returns the updated course object

description.example: A JavaScript front-end web framework for single-page application development

caption.example: Lead by industry professionals and gives an industry certification

delete.description: Delete a course by its id. Limited to lecturers

204.description: Success, course deleted. Returns an empty json

get.description: Search for courses. Possible matches include title, description, details, caption, category

200.description: Returns a array of all courses that match the query

description.example: A JavaScript front-end web framework for single-page application development

caption.example: Lead by industry professionals and gives an industry certification

get.description: Get a list of all lectures

200.description: Success, returns a array of all lecture objects.

description.example: An introduction to the Angular framework.

post.description: Create a new lecture. Limited to lecturers only.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Sample body schema to create a new lecture

description.example: Learn the basics of swift

201.description: Success, return the newly created lecture.

description.example: Learn the basics of swift

get.description: Search for lectures. Possible matches include name and description

200.description: Returns an array of all lectures that match the query

description.example: An introduction to the Angular framework.

get.description: Get the lecture by its id

200.description: Returns the lecture object that matches the id

description.example: An introduction to the Angular framework.

put.description: Update an exisiting lecture. Limited to lecturers only.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Sample body schema to update lecture

description.example: Learn the basics of swift

200.description: Success, return the newly updated lecture.

description.example: Learn the basics of swift

delete.description: Delete a lecture by its id. Limited to lecturers

get.description: Get the sub-lecture under a lecture

200.description: Return the sub-lecture under the lecture

put.description: Update an existing sub-lecture. Limited to lecturers only.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Sample body schema to update sub-lecture

description.example: Learn about variables, conditionals, functions and loops

200.description: Success, return the newly updated sub-lecture.

description.example: Learn about variables, conditionals, functions and loops

delete.description: Delete a sub-lecture under a lecture. Limited to lecturers

post.description: Create a new sub-lecture under a lecture. Limited to lecturers only.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Sample body schema to create a new sub-lecture

description.example: Learn about variables, conditionals, functions and loops

parameters.name: video
parameters.description: The file object of the sub-lecture video

201.description: Success, return the newly created sub-lecture.

Description.example: Learn about variables, conditionals, functions and loops

get.description: Get all the sub-lectures and lectures under a course

200.description: Return an array containg the course as well as its respective lectures and sub-lectures

get.description: Get a list of all quizzes

200.description: Success, returns an array of all quiz objects.

description.example: Test your knowledge on the basics of Angular JS.

get.description: Get a quiz by its id

200.description: Success, returns the quiz object

description.example: Test your knowledge on the basics of Angular JS.

get.description: Get a list of all questions associated to a quiz

200.description: Success, returns an array of all quiz questions.

post.description: Post the user's quiz results. User is obtained from jwt

200.description: Success, returns an object similar to a result object. Contains the quiz result's score, total questions, correct answers, incorrect questions, result id and grade

get.description: Gets the specific result of a quiz of a user.

200.description: Success, returns a result object

example.text: How do you create a list in Python?

get.description: Get the data on attempts by a user on a specific quiz. User is obtained from jwt

200.description: Success, returns a quiz attempt object

get.description: Gets the result of a user. User is obtained from jwt

200.description: Success, returns an array of objects of every quiz the user has taken. Each quiz contains the quiz's title, score, totalMarks, grade, time taken and quiz id
